resources.string: The booking details have been sent on your email and SMS. You will receive your driver details before your pick up time. For any queries contact our helpline.
Your booking confirmation details will be updated shortly. You will receive a notification and SMS once booking will confirmed.For any queries contact our helpline.
Kindly wait for sometime. Your booking details will be updated shortly. You will receive a notification when it will be processed. For any queries contact our helpline.
Your Booking is Processed. Make payment to confirm Booking and receive your Booking confirmation details on your Number and email. For any queries contact our helpline.
